description: FastAPI application entry point and configuration

description: Audit logging model for all CRUD operations
acceptance_criteria: Defines audit table capturing user, timestamp, action type, and changed data for all operations

description: Pydantic schemas for claims request/response validation

description: Pydantic schemas for payment processing and validation
acceptance_criteria: Defines payment schemas with sensitive data validation, amount constraints, and payee information

description: Authentication and authorization schemas
acceptance_criteria: Defines login, token response, and user role schemas with proper validation

description: Audit logging service for all system operations
acceptance_criteria: Creates audit records for all CRUD operations with user context and data change tracking

description: Authentication and authorization business logic
